docs.lead_paragraph: O'SULLIVAN--Mary Ellen, 77, of Bronxville, New York passed away peacefully on March 6th, 2014. She is survived by her brother, Jack Baker and his wife Babs, her daughter, Maura O'Sullivan, and her granddaughter, Siobhan D'Angelo. She was born to William and Catherine Baker on April 30th, 1936 in Manhattan. She received a B.A. in English from the College of Mount St. Vincent in 1958 and pursued a master's degree in English at Hunter College. She was very active in her community, volunteering her time to many organizations such as Meals on Wheels and Pregnancy Care Center. Calling hours will be held at the Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 2 to 4 and 7 to 9pm Sunday. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Joseph's Church in Bronxville, on Monday, March 10th at 10am. In lieu of flowers, the family is requesting that donations be made in her name to The Ursuline School or Pregnancy Care Center.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new protocol of early treatment could save many young lives.

headline.main: Great Hope for Babies With H.I.V.
headline.print_headline: Great Hope for Babies With H.I.V.

docs.abstract: Editorial welcomes news that the National Institutes of Health will soon sponsor clinical trials abroad to evaluate whether early and aggressive drug treatments for babies infected with HIV can effectively cure them; contends if the results are promising, treatment could spare more than 250,000 infants who are born infected each year from a lifetime of illness or costly and toxic treatments.
docs.snippet: A new protocol of early treatment could save many young lives.

docs.lead_paragraph: Parental anxiety, even before pregnancy, may affect the offspring’s health.
docs.abstract: Gray Matter column by Prof Inna Gaisler-Salomon describes her research on whether stress can be inherited, which was published in the journal Biological Psychiatry; notes that study found that a relatively mild form of stress in female rats, before pregnancy, can affect their offspring in a way that appears to be unrelated to parental care.
docs.snippet: Parental anxiety, even before pregnancy, may affect the offspring’s health.

docs.lead_paragraph: Qatar Airways and Emirates Airline have defended their policies on pregnancy and marriage for cabin crew after the Qatar carrier came under fire over its working conditions.

headline.main: Gulf Airlines Defend Female Cabin Crew Policies
headline.print_headline: Gulf Airlines Defend Female Cabin Crew Policies

docs.snippet: Qatar Airways and Emirates Airline have defended their policies on pregnancy and marriage for cabin crew after the Qatar carrier came under fire over its working conditions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two more abortion clinics were forced to close in Texas, and the state is moving on to the next phase of pressuring clinics.
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column notes that closing of two abortion clinics in Texas means there are only six places where women can go to end a pregnancy in the state, unless a court intervenes; warns Texas is going further by requiring the clinics that remain to have facilities necessary for major surgical procedures.
docs.snippet: Two more abortion clinics were forced to close in Texas, and the state is moving on to the next phase of pressuring clinics.
